name: Antocolypse
description:
Antocolypse: The Retro Game with Retro Music based off of a Retro Movie!  Antocolypse is heavily inspired by the movie Them! which was released in 1954.  This is a top down shooter where you have to kill the ants in a nest and then enter 'The Warp' which warps you to the next SUPER-Ant Nest! Find out why the ants are so huge and more in this fun, yet short top down shooter, retro action game!

Controls:

WASD to move around

Left Mouse Button to shoot/To press (gun is pointed towards your mouse)

Press R to restart the scene if you get lost.

NOTE: If an ant touches you, the level that you are in restarts.  That is to say that if an ant touches you, you die and have to restart that level.
